mapper.select: SELECT a.rec_id, a.name, a.url, a.intro, a.qr_code, a.cover, a.belong_to, a.belong_to_id, a.play_num, a.order_num, a.create_id, a.create_time, a.update_id, a.update_time, if(b.rec_id IS NULL, 'false', 'true') is_collect FROM `audio` a LEFT JOIN my_collect b ON a.rec_id = b.collect_id WHERE b.create_id = #{userId} AND b.collect_type = 'audio'
